ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fmptd.1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. C ) |

| 3 | 1 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. x e. A B e. C ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_fmpt | |- ( A. x e. A B e. C <-> F : A --> C ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> F : A --> C ) |
